attributes.action: Accept Ukrainian Asylum seekers and refugees escaping Russian aggression.
attributes.additional_details: This is an unprecedented act of war against a sovereign nation. As the UK government, G7 and NATO have failed to protect the soverign integrity of Ukraine it must now do all it can do protect the people. I like many other UK citizens have friends in the Ukraine who I wish to offer my home to.
attributes.background: Create an immediate refugee scheme that permits UK hosts, references and or guarantors to vet and vouch for Ukrainian citizens escaping the violence.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
